goal.en: "Chemistry" is a basic science and very important to life, medicine, technology, environment, energy and so on. To enable all students, in particular, these of the other Departments understand much more about the chemistry and its applications in daily life, the teacher who has the major of chemistry will choose the right materials and demonstrate couple simple experiments for this course.
goal.ch: 「化學」除了是一門基礎自然科學之外，在生活、醫藥、科技、環境與能源…等各方面都十分重要，是一門核心的科學。為使全校學生尤其是非理工學系的學生對「化學」的基本知識與其應用有較深的認識，化學系的教師將以深入淺出的教學方式，選擇合適且生活化的教材與簡易實驗，針對下述課程內容開設此課程。

content.en:
1. Chemistry to our daily life
2. Chemistry and Food (1) - Water
3. Chemistry and Food (2) - Introduction to Key Chemical Components of Beverages
4. Chemistry and Food (3) - Introduction to Key Chemical Components of Beverages
5. Chemistry and Food (4) - Fatty Acids and Cholesterol
6. Chemistry and Food (5) - Food Additives (Antioxidants and Preservatives)
7. Chemistry and Food (6) - Food Additives (Pigments)
8. Air Composition and Contamination - ""Under the Dome"" documentary
9. Mid-term examination
10. Air Composition and Pollution - Current Situation in Taiwan
11. Chemistry and Household Articles (1) - Cleaning Articles Chemical Compositions (Surfactants)
12. Chemistry and Household Articles (2) - Introduction to Chemical Compositions of Cosmetics (A)
13. Chemistry and Household Articles (3) - Introduction to Chemical Compositions of Cosmetics (B)
14. Chemistry and Household Articles (4) - Introduction to Chemical Compositions of Cosmetics (C)
15. Chemistry and Household Articles (5) - Introduction of plastics (macromolecule materials)
16. Chemistry and Household Articles (6) - Introduction of plastics (plasticizers)
17. Q & A Section and Special Topics about the Chemistry Requested by Students
18. Final examination"

textbook.ch: 指定教科書: 毒家報導─揭露新聞中與生活有關的化學常識(第4版)，高憲明著，五南出版，2018年。 參考書目: 觀念化學，John Suchocki著，李千毅等譯，天下文化出版，2006年。"
